  <head></head>
  <body>
    <h1>Release Notes</h1>
    <p>The following features were introduced or enhanced in the unreleased Conjur OSS suite.</p>

    <h2>Components</h2>
    <p>These are the components that comprise the Conjur Open Source Suite with links to their GitHub releases:</p>
    <p>
      <ul>
         <li><a href="https://github.com/cyberark/conjur/releases/tag/v1.4.6">cyberark/conjur v1.4.6</a> (2020-01-21)</li>
         <li><a href="https://github.com/cyberark/conjur-oss-helm-chart/releases/tag/v1.3.7">cyberark/conjur-oss-helm-chart v1.3.7</a> (2019-01-31)</li>
         <li><a href="https://github.com/cyberark/conjur-api-python3/releases/tag/v0.0.5">cyberark/conjur-api-python3 v0.0.5</a> (2019-12-06)</li>
      </ul>
    </p>

    <h2>Upgrade Instructions</h2>
    <p>Upgrade instructions are available for the following suite components:</p>
    <p>
      <ul>
        <li><a href="https://docs.cyberark.com/Product-Doc/OnlineHelp/AAM-DAP/Latest/en/Content/Deployment/Upgrade/upgrade-intro.htm ">cyberark/conjur</a></li>
      </ul>
    </p>

    <h2>What's New by Component</h2>
    <p>
      <ul>
        <!-- href target here does not work as it doesn't yet escape the spaces/slashes -->
          <li><MadCap:xref href="#cyberark/conjur">cyberark/conjur</MadCap:xref></li><!-- href target here does not work as it doesn't yet escape the spaces/slashes -->
          <li><MadCap:xref href="#cyberark/conjur-oss-helm-chart">cyberark/conjur-oss-helm-chart</MadCap:xref></li><!-- href target here does not work as it doesn't yet escape the spaces/slashes -->
          <li><MadCap:xref href="#cyberark/conjur-api-python3">cyberark/conjur-api-python3</MadCap:xref></li>
      </ul>
    </p>

    <!-- href target here does not work as it doesn't yet escape the spaces/slashes -->
    <h3><a name="cyberark-cyberark/conjur"></a>cyberark/conjur</h3>
        <h4><a href="https://github.com/cyberark/conjur/releases/tag/v1.3.6">v1.3.6</a> (2019-02-19)</h4>
        <p>
          <ul>
              <li><strong>Changed</strong>
                <ul>
                  <li>Reduced IAM authentication logging</li>
                  <li>Refactored authentication strategies</li>
                </ul>
              </li>
              <li><strong>Removed</strong>
                <ul>
                  <li>Removed OIDC APIs public access</li>
                </ul>
              </li>
          </ul>
        </p>
        <h4><a href="https://github.com/cyberark/conjur/releases/tag/v1.4.4">v1.4.4</a> (2019-12-19)</h4>
        <p>
          <ul>
              <li><strong>Added</strong>
                <ul>
                  <li>Early validation of account existence during OIDC authentication</li>
                  <li>Code coverage reporting and collection</li>
                </ul>
              </li>
              <li><strong>Changed</strong>
                <ul>
                  <li>Bumped puma from 3.12.0 to 3.12.2</li>
                  <li>Bumped rack from 1.6.11 to 1.6.12</li>
                  <li>Bumped excon from 0.62.0 to 0.71.0</li>
                </ul>
              </li>
              <li><strong>Fixed</strong>
                <ul>
                  <li>Fixed password rotation of blank password</li>
                  <li>Fixed bug with multi-cert CA chains in Kubernetes service accounts</li>
                  <li>Fixed build issues with creating namespaces with multiple values</li>
                </ul>
              </li>
              <li><strong>Removed</strong>
                <ul>
                  <li>Removed follower env configuration</li>
                </ul>
              </li>
          </ul>
        </p>
        <h4><a href="https://github.com/cyberark/conjur/releases/tag/v1.4.6">v1.4.6</a> (2020-01-21)</h4>
        <p>
          <ul>
              <li><strong>Changed</strong>
                <ul>
                  <li>K8s hosts' application identity is extracted from annotations or id. If it is
defined in annotations it will taken from there and if not, it will be taken
from the id.</li>
                </ul>
              </li>
          </ul>
        </p><!-- href target here does not work as it doesn't yet escape the spaces/slashes -->
    <h3><a name="cyberark-cyberark/conjur-oss-helm-chart"></a>cyberark/conjur-oss-helm-chart</h3>
        <h4><a href="https://github.com/cyberark/conjur-oss-helm-chart/releases/tag/v1.3.7">v1.3.7</a> (2019-01-31)</h4>
        <p>
          <ul>
              <li><strong>Changed</strong>
                <ul>
                  <li>Server ciphers have been upgraded to TLS1.2 levels.</li>
                </ul>
              </li>
          </ul>
        </p><!-- href target here does not work as it doesn't yet escape the spaces/slashes -->
    <h3><a name="cyberark-cyberark/conjur-api-python3"></a>cyberark/conjur-api-python3</h3>
        <h4><a href="https://github.com/cyberark/conjur-api-python3/releases/tag/v0.0.5">v0.0.5</a> (2019-12-06)</h4>
        <p>
          <ul>
              <li><strong>Added</strong>
                <ul>
                  <li>Added ability to delete policies [#23](https://github.com/cyberark/conjur-api-python3/issues/23)</li>
                </ul>
              </li>
          </ul>
        </p>
  </body>
</html>
